stories.text:
Hey folks, my friends and I have been working on a text chat app that matches you to someone you disagree with (anonymously) in a 1-on-1 chat. Imagine Tinder, but about any topic you care about!

It's just once a week, and matches come out Saturday at 11 AM PST. It'd mean the world if you checked us out (it's our first week!).

Here's the link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/dissonant/id1578399632, or just search "Dissonant" on the IOS app store.

--

Here's the questions for this week (set by us for now, user-submitted soon. Comment what you'd like to talk about for next week's round):

1. Is Microsoft’s move to make their library more accessible (making games available on PC, Xbox, and Switch) a bad business decision?

2. Are Manchester City and PSG “ruining football” with their lavish spending on player wages and the transfer market?

3. Should the Lakers’ championship in 2020 be worth less because it happened in the “bubble”?

4. Is Helium Blockchain (the peer-to-peer router) legit?

5. Should we do we anything about the Taliban’s takeover of Afghanistan?

6. Are you going back to the movie theater any time soon?

7. With remote work and Covid, is being in SF still important to the startup community?

8. Should Louis CK go back on tour following the #MeToo allegations around him?

9. Is saying no to friendships you don’t want, even if it’s really needed by the other side, okay?

10. Is the increasing popularization of EDM a sign of the future of music?
stories.title: Chat 1-on-1 with the Other Side: MVP app *literally just* went live
